lead_paragraph: Newcastle United's Premier League survival hopes took a blow with a 3-2 defeat at Norwich City on Saturday that left them second-bottom and six points adrift of their opponents whose own hopes of staying up are improving by the week.

headline.print_headline: Newcastle Defeat Leaves Benitez With Mountain to Climb
headline.main: Newcastle Defeat Leaves Benitez With Mountain to Climb

snippet: Newcastle United's Premier League survival hopes took a blow with a 3-2 defeat at Norwich City on Saturday that left them second-bottom and six points adrift of their opponents whose own hopes of staying up are improving by the week....
